title: Italian Mountain Man
description: I’m a smuggler for the Italian mafia.And she’s completely off limits…the Don’s daughter.I’ve wanted her for four long years, and I’m done waiting. Speaking up in front of the head of the family will likely get me killed, but life isn’t worth living without her.I’m tired of keeping my desire for her a secret, and that’s not the only secret I’m keeping.It’s time to come clean about everything but when I do, what happens when I find out she’s been keeping a secret of her own?*Italian Mountain Man is an insta-everything standalone instalove romance with an HEA, no cheating, and no cliffhanger.
author: Flora Ferrari
